summary.p: this User Control is used to obtain a DataSet of announcement information from the Announcements table, and then databind the results to a templated DataList server control.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.Announcements.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event handler on this User Control is used to obtain a DataSet of announcement information from the Announcements table, and then databind the results to a templated DataList server control. It uses the Rainbow.AnnouncementsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: T:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB
member.summary: Class that encapsulates all data logic necessary to add/query/delete announcements within the Portal database.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB.GetAnnouncements(System.Int32,Rainbow.Configuration.WorkFlowVersion,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The GetAnnouncements method returns a DataSet containing all of the announcements for a specific portal module from the Announcements database table.
member.remarks: A DataSet is returned from this method to allow this method to support both desktop and mobile Web UI.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB.GetSingleAnnouncement(System.Int32,Rainbow.Configuration.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary: The GetSingleAnnouncement method returns a SqlDataReader containing details about a specific announcement from the Announcements database table.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB.DeleteAnnouncement(System.Int32)
member.summary: The DeleteAnnouncement method deletes the specified announcement from the Announcements database table.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB.AddAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
AddAnnouncement Method
The AddAnnouncement method adds a new announcement to the Announcements database table, and returns the ItemID value as a result.
Other relevant sources: + AddAnnouncement Stored Procedure

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsDB.UpdateAnnouncement(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
UpdateAnnouncement Method
The UpdateAnnouncement method updates the specified announcement within the Announcements database table.
Other relevant sources: + UpdateAnnouncement Stored Procedure

member.name: T:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsEdit
member.summary: Announcmeent Edit

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsEdit.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event on this Page is used to obtain the ModuleID and ItemID of the announcement to edit. It then uses the Rainbow.AnnouncementsDB() data component to populate the page's edit controls with the annoucement details.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsEdit.OnUpdate(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The UpdateBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to either create or update an announcement. It uses the Rainbow.AnnouncementsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Rainbow.DesktopModules.AnnouncementsEdit.OnDelete(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DeleteBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to delete an an announcement. It uses the Rainbow.AnnouncementsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.
